uNmINeD is a closed source software published in binary form under the following conditions:

What you can do

* You can download and use uNmINeD for free.

Restrictions

* Commercial use is forbidden.
* Do not distribute or modify uNmINeD.
* You can use uNmINeD at your own risk. The author makes no warranties of any kind, and is not liable for any claim, damages or other liability.

Other

* I reserve the right to change this agreement at any time for future versions with or without notice.
